Uses of Package
org.javautil.document.style

Packages that use org.javautil.document.style
org.javautil.dataset   
org.javautil.dataset.render   
org.javautil.dataset.render.typewriter   
org.javautil.document   
org.javautil.document.style A generic framework for rendering styles in documents. 
org.javautil.text Provides classes that can help with text processing, similar to the java.text package. 
 

Classes in org.javautil.document.style used by org.javautil.dataset
HorizontalAlignment
          Possible values for horizontal alignment; not all values are necessarily possible by the underlying document style.

Classes in org.javautil.document.style used by org.javautil.document

          Contains a named map of Style objects that can be generated from various configuration files.

          Interface describing additional feature settings that can be applied to font rendering in order to utilize document or format specific features.

          Parses a StyleDefinition into a Style.
